About

14 Jun 2013

About

Founder and CEO at unplu.gg - a no friction platform to manage your energy at home. I do some consulting occasionally, helping others build their products.

I still don't know what I want to do when I grow up. Currently focused on building web products, and like to work on every part of that process. Sometimes I code, others I think about what should we be coding. In general, I like positions of interface between disciplines.

Available for Ruby on Rails, Data and Internet of Things consulting work.
